title: Is it time for South Carolina to panic? Three keys for the Gamecocks in the women's Final Four
description: South Carolina had to rally (twice) to reach the Final Four. Can the reigning champs still run it back?
author: Michael Voepel and Andrea Adelson

title: Ranking the 15 best players: From Bueckers and Betts to Paopao and Strong
description: Who follows Paige Bueckers and Lauren Betts in ESPN's Final Four player rankings?
author: Michael Voepel and Charlie Creme and Kendra Andrews and Alexa Philippou

title: Fan jeers and a cupped ear - is Postecoglou feeling the friction?
description: Ange Postecoglou had a torrid night as Tottenham lost at Chelsea, facing the fury of his own fans. He cupped his ear towards them when he thought they had equalised - so has that made things worse?

title: Shirts, sponsors and bad blood: how Trump's tariffs might affect sport
description: After US president Donald Trump unveiled his new trade tariffs, BBC sports editor Dan Roan looks at what impact the move could have on the world of sport.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 9 - Ryan Lorthridge (1995)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Lorthridge wore only jersey Nos. 33 and 9 and put up 7.4 points, 1.9 rebounds, and 2.7 assists per game.

title: Boston Celtics vs. Phoenix Suns: Stream, lineups, injury reports, broadcast (4/4)
description: The Celtics should win this one without much fuss, but as we saw with Miami, a subpar outing can sink any game.

title: Arsenal rule Gabriel out for rest of season
description: Arsenal will not have Gabriel for their Champions League quarter-final tie against Real Madrid after he was ruled out for the rest of the season.

title: Brilliant Bunting finally claims Premier League win as Littler exits early
description: A revitalised Stephen Bunting defeated Gerwyn Price to seal a magical maiden nightly Premier League win in Berlin as Luke Littler suffered a shock early exit.
